metadata.name: Chilli Plant
metadata.description:
SERIAL CO_ is a creative technology studio composed of digital natives that produce and develop art projects, products and services that connect both the physical world and the Metaverse through phygital experiences.

Chilli Plant is a 3D model inspired by Kumari Nahappan’s artwork, Tango. This plant was designed and produced as a key element of a World Effect AR filter for Art Reimagined Singapore, an initiative by Meta. The AR filter was made with the intention of educating users on the chilli plant’s growth journey and Kumari’s artist intention for the Tango chillies. The ending frame in the AR filter will showcase the chillies dancing to the Tango, and users can dance together with the chillies.
